授業目的:
The purpose of this course is to guide students towards gaining and being able to demonstrate a critical and practical understanding of key concepts from the field of Organizational Behaviour (OB).

A theme running though the course explores and illustrates how OB can be applied strategically towards managing and leading organizational change.

In support of each participating student’s professional development, the course provides opportunities for students individually and in teams to rehearse and perform roles as consultants to organizations seeking to change established behaviours.

Note: The instructor has designed this course on the assumption that some students may have no prior knowledge or experience of OB theory or practice.
到達目標:
After working actively and collaboratively though this course, students should be able to demonstrate:

An informed and critical understanding of key concepts from the field of Organizational Behaviour (OB).

An informed and practical understanding of how OB concepts might be applied strategically in processes of managing and leading organizational change.

Practical insights into how consultants, who might be either external and / or internal to a particular organization, might act as ‘agents’ of behavioural change in these organizations with the effect of improving the relative business performance of these organizations.
授業方法:
Seven face-to-face class sessions.
Home study reading assignments (individual and group) with focus on a set textbook.
LUNA Discussion Forums on related class themes will be opened in between class sessions.

第1回: Week #1: Defining organisations and organisational behaviour (OB)
第2回: Developing a change management perspective on OB
第3回: Week #2: Metaphors of organization: visualizing organisations as systems
第5回: Week #3: Comparing organisations and institutions as contexts for managing and leading change
第7回: Week #4: Organisational politics and leading organisational change
第9回: Week #5: Developing organisational and institutional resilience
第10回: Discussion: Comparing business consultancy perspectives on developing organisational and institutional resilience:
第11回: Week #6: Managing institutional change and conflict: simulation
第12回: Managing institutional change and conflict: simulation debriefing
第14回: Entering a career as an international organisational change consultant
